name: Agent Team Simulator
description:
CONGRATULATIONS!

You have been selected to be the newest Captain of Agent Inc.
Welcome aboard.

With the World in disarray, and chaos in every corner, can you restore order?

Key Game Features


Assemble your Agents
Elite-level personnel are the heart of your organisation, and it's your responsibility to build a squad full of them. You'll start with just a single Agent, but over time, you will scout more, and the size of your team will grow, from one to hundreds! No two Agents are alike, each has their own unique appearance, backstory, origin, and stats, making every new addition special.

Fight Crime Across the Globe
From America to Australia, Japan to Costa Rica, there is a job for your Team almost anywhere you can imagine! Choose your Agents wisely, as their stats will determine how suited they are to that Mission. It's all about strategy!

Improve your Geography Knowledge
With the hugely diverse Agent backgrounds, as well as Mission locations that span all 7 continents, your understanding of the different regions of the world will be expanded in no time! Plus, with Quizzes on the Capitals and Flags of the Countries of the game, you can further bolster your geographic proficiency. (and earn some in-game money in the process).

Get Rewarded for Mission Success
After the completion of a triumphant expedition, your Agents will return with prizes in the form of 'Credits' and 'Gems', these can be used to Scout for brand new agents, and to purchase Items that will aid future Missions. Also, frequent mission success will help you towards unlocking the 100 Steam achievements!

Other Game Features


  • Daily Missions
  • Gacha Mechanics
  • Fun Minigames
  • 100 Achievements
  • Loyalty Bonuses
  • And more

There's no time to waste Captain! Download 'Agent Team Simulator' today!
